projects.name: SOLAR-FRNSW
projects.description:
SOLAR-FRNSW is a new mental health focused mobile app for Fire & Rescue NSW. It is a recovery program for survivors of disasters or other traumatic events who are experienceing ongoing distress or adjustment difficulties. 

The app includes a user chosen male or female voice over. The modules include text, illustrations, videos, animations, quizzes, checklists, form inputs and check in notification on commitments. There is also a notification scheduler feature and capacity for users to create personalised plan.

projects.name: Pappyon:Business Networking
projects.description:
Pappyon is an app to streamlines your professional networking into one hub, bring together all contact details, social links and online channels into one place for optimized relationship. 

I joined the development team and helped with upgrading the entire project from Flutter 1 to Flutter 2.3 with updating all out dated plugins and refactoring deprecated code. Also implemented the a few key functions such as video capture, video play/uploading and reply comment.

projects.name: MoRE Program
projects.description:
MoRE Program is an mobile application to help people manage their worries and mood. 

The app included a schedule of activities; a mood monitor, prompted with notification reminders. The app integrates with a Content Management System(CMS) to allow the team to make simple content changes to the modules.

projects.name: Built a cross platform ionic mobile shopping sing Magento's Restful API
projects.description:
Built an ionic app that connected to magento's restful API without the need for a bridge sitting on the server (Probably will need  to build one to access some higher privileged resources) 

I have more screenshots of it in my LinkedIn Post Here

projects.name: Peebee Mobile Apps
projects.description:
Built a cross platform hybrid app that connects members of the general public with fitness trainers on demand

In Addition to the Client application, I was involved in building the Peebee for Trainers Mobile App

Android 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app.peebee.customer&hl=en_ZA

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/peebee/id1441425142

projects.name: Open Source Form Builder Library for Ionic 4
projects.description:
I worked on a custom library for building ionic 4 forms that I have published on npm, It managed to get a star from one of the core ionic team developers on github.

You can have a look at it on github 

https://github.com/ronald-hove/ion-custom-form-builder
